title: Repainter’s latest update adds quick settings toggle, separate color controls on Pixel and One UI
content:
Material You offers easy customization for Android in ways we’ve never seen officially, but it’s only so flexible. Repainter was released early this year as a neat way to enhance Material You colors, and in its latest update, the app is adding a quick settings toggle as well as the ability to separate colors used for accents and the background.

more…

The post Repainter’s latest update adds quick settings toggle, separate color controls on Pixel and One UI appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Repainter has picked up another update which adds even more control over the colors of Android 12 on Pixel and Samsung devices.
